channel.title: Error while editing what NPC's say. 317 (Repping)
channel.description:
I'm new to server making and I was changing what NPC said "Welcome" and as I ran the server, I got this error.
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/4rt3bs.jpg[/img]
Can anyone help me please? Thank you.

item.title: Error while editing what NPC's say. 317 (Repping)
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“dddylan98, post:8, topic:424304”]Ok, this is the first time I’ve touched NPChandler so I will just insert it from my original source and see if that works.
And that didn’t work Any other ideas?

It wasn’t in NPChandler, I put in the old autospawn and it works now. Thanks guys.[/quote]

It’s because (as the output suggests) that it was a problem while parsing an int in autospawn.cfg, most likely caused my an extra space, or a space where there should be a tab.

Read full topic
item.source: Error while editing what NPC's say. 317 (Repping)

item.title: Error while editing what NPC's say. 317 (Repping)
item.dc:creator: @dddylan98 dddylan98
item.description:
@dddylan98 wrote:

Ok, this is the first time I’ve touched NPChandler so I will just insert it from my original source and see if that works.
And that didn’t work Any other ideas?

It wasn’t in NPChandler, I put in the old autospawn and it works now. Thanks guys.

Read full topic
item.source: Error while editing what NPC's say. 317 (Repping)

item.title: Error while editing what NPC's say. 317 (Repping)
item.dc:creator: @lostmyphat lostmyphat
item.description:
@lostmyphat wrote:

Save all your files, and start putting in backups of the files you last messed with. You will find what file isn’t cooperating, but from the CMD it looks like npchandler.

Read full topic

item.title: Error while editing what NPC's say. 317 (Repping)
item.dc:creator: @lostmyphat lostmyphat
item.description:
@lostmyphat wrote:

[quote=“dddylan98, post:4, topic:424304”][quote author=lostmyphat link=topic=526957.msg3840063#msg3840063 date=1323146149]
You must have done something else.
[/quote]
I must have but I cannot figure out what, I changed everything I thought I edited back but still same error. Do you guys know which file it is erroring in?

You use tab’s not spaces when editing that configuration file.

I know, this is for the autospawn file right?[/quote]

It’s for shop.cfg too.

Read full topic

I must have but I cannot figure out what, I changed everything I thought I edited back but still same error. Do you guys know which file it is erroring in?

zuppers:

You use tab’s not spaces when editing that configuration file.

I know, this is for the autospawn file right?
